actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs may furnish outpatient dental services and treatment for a non-service-connected disability to any war veteran who has a service-connected disability of 80 percent or more.

summary.text: Extends outpatient dental services and treatment for a non-service-connected disability to any war veteran who has a service-connected disability of 80 percent or more. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 612 (b))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs may furnish outpatient dental services and treatment for a non-service-connected disability to any war veteran who has a service-connected disability of 80 percent or more.
